properties.name: A good place to drink. BYOB.
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoUsed to jump the fence and get drunk on wine where the animals, Christians and gladiators would wait for their turn.

properties.name: A good place to dump cats.
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoA lot of fucking cats! And someone leaves milk out for them. the bowls are there. I\'m a dog person, myself.

properties.name: A good place to play with monkeys
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoVery old zoo, maybe one of the oldest. But according to various websites things have been changing over the past few years. Anyhow, it used to be a great place to play with monkeys on a Sunday afternoon.

properties.name: Almost
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoI almost had an apartment around here somewhere. I would have had to quit school to stay. Maybe I should have since my Syracuse degree has been useless anyway. Should\'ve, would\'ve, yada yada...

properties.name: American Siberia...aka Buffalo
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoBuffalo, NYI was born on the frozen tundra of the American Siberia where I was raised by Jesuit wolves. After high school I returned to the old country where I lived and studied. From the top of City Hall you can get the best view of the wasteland in winter.

properties.name: Budapest
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoCommunist factories, Soviet troops, rich German\'s with beautiful sports cars, Laibach, cheap pastries, Roman ruins, Hungarian wine, Radio free Europe, Rhapsody in Blue, the opera, underground (literally) clubs.

properties.name: Castle of the King
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoWhere the kingdom began. I ruled from here and now rule in absentia. My kingdom is the island, from the station to the borg.

properties.name: Church of Santa Croce
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoMost interesting church in Firenze. Beautiful art work and the cross has lights that cast two shadows behind it eerily evoking two theives who were crucified with Christ. Machiavelli & Michelangelo are entombed here.

properties.name: Elba
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoTook a ferry here from Livorno. Pisa was a bore so we ran off to Elba. We rented vespas, bought a few bottles of wine, some bread, cheese and drove all night around half the island. Crashed the bike here for the first time.

properties.name: Elba II
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoStopped here around 11pm. Found the only place open, a pub. The owner made some of the best french fries ever. Had a bottle of wine and took one for the road. We had already finished everything we bought in Portoferraio.

properties.name: Elba III
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoGot hit by a bat while riding along a cliff. Pretty dark stretch of road here.

properties.name: Elba IV
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoGot back here about 5am. Went to sleep on the beach and woke up surrounded by half naked women. Not a bad weekend.

properties.name: Firenze - My Apartment
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoThere\'s a gelato place around the corner, it\'s alright but the waitress is beautiful. I have a balcony that I drink a glass of wine on every night after dinner. All the men in the apartments do this and we wave or nod to each other, a kind of after dinner, non-speaking social club of gestures.

properties.name: Roof of my best apartment
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoWest 4th and Charles, NY NYMy first apartment in Manhattan. Snowballs off the roof in winter at the telephone booth across the street. Great view of the WTC and Empire. Tar beach in summer, beers and smokes, ballerinas, models, paella.

properties.name: Second Place in New York
properties.description: Posted by Thekingoftaishojane street, ny nyHigh Ceilings, fireplace and a dalamatian. Great steps and burritos around the corner.

properties.name: Vienna
properties.description: Posted by ThekingoftaishoThe old Ludvig van.
